ai-tha-ap172:1.2_0: world’s Elder, unskilled in the world,
ai-tha-ap172:1.3_0: if, when there is a hut,
ai-tha-ap172:1.4_0: a sage who is skilled in meditation.
ai-tha-ap172:2.4_0: and sometimes I gave them five birds.
ai-tha-ap172:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap172:4.1_0: At seven eons of the cosmos contracted
ai-tha-ap172:4.2_0: I was king, a wife of clothes.
ai-tha-ap172:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap172:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pañcasāti.
ai-tha-ap172:8.1_0: The seventh sub-chapter on service is finished.
